tab.name: Options

option.name: Treat all columns as single feature

tab.option: Check this box if all columns even collection and vector columns represent a single feature i.e. can only be changed as a whole.
The columns that contain features your model requires. Note that it is not allowed to have columns both as feature and prediction column.
The number of rows to use for learning the local explanation model for a single incoming row.

Using a seed allows to reproduce the results of the loop. If this box is checked the seed displayed in the text box is used, otherwise a new seed is generated for each execution. The new button allows to generate a new random seed.
